body.name: Modway Ripple Ribbed Armless Mid Back Swivel Conference Office Chair In White
features: ERGONOMIC SUPPORT - Enjoy reliable comfort with a thoughtfully designed modern conference chair with ribbed sling seating. Experience ergonomic lumbar support from the densely padded foam cushioning
STYLISH AESTHETIC - Make a statement with an adjustable swivel conference chair that completes the contemporary office space. Ripple is a versatile choice for the computer desk or conference table
VIVID COLORS - Prim is a versatile modern conference chair. Have fun with while seated in an office chair with a bold, vibrant hue; or liven up the office with a sleek neutral color
SUPERIOR CONSTRUCTION - Built sturdy for everyday use, Ripple boasts a chrome aluminum frame with a 360º swivel, one-touch height adjustment, and five dual wheel casters for easy mobility
body.description: As with the ripple after-effects caused by the toss of a pebble, there’s no telling where the Ripple Armless Office Chair will take you. For those who appreciate natural resolve, without the need to know the destination point, then Ripple Computer Desk Chair is for you. Outfitted with a polished chrome steel frame and five dual-wheel casters for easy mobility over hardwood or carpeted surfaces, the padded faux leather Ripple task chair begins and ends with innovation. Ripple is the perfect ergonomic office chair for conference rooms and workstations, features fine stitching and trim throughout, and comes fully height adjustable with a 360-degree swivel.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 24, 2018
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfortable, stylish, EASY setup
reviews.reviewText: Purchased for my home office after viewing 1,000+ chairs on Amazon. SO MANY CHAIRS. How do we choose? You start your search looking at office chairs, and six hours down the rabbit hole, you’ve just bought a sensory deprivation tank. Anyway, I wanted something compact, comfortable, stylish, and easy to set up. This chair fits the bill splendidly.First, I chose this chair because I can store it flush under my desk when not in use, specifically due to the fact that it doesn’t have arm rests. Fits under a standard height desk with no issues, and even some shorter desks because it adjusts up and down with the lever.I wanted a chair that was stylish and not a bulky, black, executive chair that’s nice to look at but impractical to use. This chair looks really expensive given the price point of $100 approximately. Note, I chose camel color and it’s a true to color.Comfort wise, so far I love this chair. Lumbar support is on point, it’s got a wide seat and back. Feels plush. My butt thanks me. I am 5’6 and 135lbs; someone much taller and heavier would have no issue with this chair.I included a picture to show the ease of setup. It took longer to unpack/unwrap this chair from the box than the actual setup itself. Literally done in 4 steps and 2 minutes. I appreciate the ease in setup because I am just not good with manuals/directions. See: IKEA dresser that I installed drawers in, backwards. So the fact that my cat could have put this chair together, really was a plus for me.Highly recommend, will update periodically.Update: Feb 2019 -- Having this chair for nearly 8 months, I have some thoughts on it. For those who sit all day, every day at a desk, this chair is going to lack comfortable butt support over time. I am finding that some sort of orthopedic bolster to sit on, on this chair, would probably help significantly, as I am experiencing soreness and stiffness from sitting in this chair for extended periods despite getting up to take breaks. What I've also noticed too, which I didn't think about when purchasing, is that this chair lacks the ability to tilt back or rock back. Actually, the backpiece does not move. So, I am essentially sort of pushed forward in this chair, and it is giving me some spinal strain. Structurally, it has held up. The leatherette hasn't worn down. The wheels haven't popped off. Aesthetically, it is a stylish chair. BUT UNFORTUNATELY FOR MY BUTT, this chair is likely going to be replaced sometime soon, as it's just not as comfortable as I hoped it would be over the course of time. Out of the box was great, but padding has worn and lumbar observation noted above, is sending me back to the rabbit hole to find something more suited for me.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I needed a budget friendly and comfortable chair for my college student. This chair was easy to put together. I did it myself in probably two minutes or less. The chair is comfortable, sturdy and fits me comfortably at 5’3” and my son who is 6’3”. I would definitely recommend this chair.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 16, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars High Weight Capacity and Attractive
reviews.reviewText: The weight capacity is 330lbs and it is sturdy. I love the curved style and way ribbed vinyl. SO easy for a single person to assemble! Unfortunately I had to return the chairs because they are beige. I attached a photo of one next to my white wall and black floor for reference.I replaced them with red and since I use only use them for playing cards, they are comfortable enough. I would not recommend these chairs for long hours at a desk.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Finally a office chair for a small person. The back support is wonderful!
reviews.reviewText: The chair design is simple but beautiful. The seat depth was perfect for me at 5'7" tall providing the back support that's almost impossible to find in today's market. The size of the chair is perfect for the size of the space...in this case a class A motorhome. The chair is very stable and strong. The color is not "white" it is "off white" with an ivory tinge. I'm very pleased with this purchase!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Nice seating, pretty color love it

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 22, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This desk chair is great! Very sleek and clean lined for that simplistic look. The instructions recommended 2 people assemble it but I had it together by myself in 10 minutes. If you’re expecting a stark, snow white color, this is not the chair for you. It is a beautiful cream color, which is exactly what I wanted. You can see the difference between the white decor on my desk and the color of the chair. I think it’s beautiful. Very happy with this purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 4, 2018
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Good looking and comfy chair but poor quality
reviews.reviewText: I received the chair today. Box was in great condition. I carefully opened it, and as stated on the box, I removed all the parts from the box and inspected them before discarding the box.I easily assembled the chair in less than 5 minutes. I sat on it, lift the seat up, then sat again to adjust the seat height.And that’s it.I was happy because it’s comfortable, rolls great and was the exact orange I was looking for.So I discarded the box.I showed it to my husband shortly after and I noticed a big tear in the seat. It probably happened the two times I sat on it.I’m 105 pounds so clearly I think the chair cover is just bad quality.Too bad the box is already outside in my trash can, I would return the chair otherwise.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars This chair is not white. It's creamy-yellowish.
reviews.reviewText: If you're wanting a bright, crisp, clean-looking white office/desk chair, this isn't it. Chair is cute, comfy, but definitely NOT white.

reviews.reviewTitle: Modway Ripple, sedia da ufficio con schienale centrale
reviews.reviewText: Belle e veramente comodo…le ho comprate in offerta perché il costo lo ritenevo decisamente proporzionato al prodotto…fuori offerta sono decisamente troppo troppo care.

reviews.reviewTitle: Very Nice Chair. Love The Colour!
reviews.reviewText: I am replacing the exact same chair I bought 5 years ago from Wayfair. It's the same exact brand and model so I have a lot of experience with these. I bought this for $129 back then and then prices skyrocketed in 2022 (doubled in price) like everything else so when this went on sale for $139 on Amazon I jumped on it! I'm so glad!I'm 5'11 and 180 lbs and I used this chair almost daily for 5 years, about 8 hours a day/7 days a week (I work at my desk ever day). It held up well until last year the seat started to develop a few cracks and also the padding started to wear out. No real complaints though because again, I use this chair a LOT.This new one is exactly the same though it now seems to have better bolts on the underside. I do feel like it may have less padding on the seat than before, but it's not obvious (so I could be wrong).These take about 5 minutes to setup. It's super easy and didn't require any tools.For $139 if it lasts as long as the old one, then I'd say I got my money's worth. It's very unique in colour and style and sure beats boring garish gaming chairs and ugly bland black/grey office chairs.
A good comfortable desk chair that fits under the desk. I took one star away because there is some noticeable glue residue on the back of the one I received. Not real bad, but a little annoying.

reviews.reviewTitle: The chair is not super comfortable, but it is better quality than a ...
reviews.reviewText: The chair is not super comfortable, but it is better quality than a few I have seen of similar style. I am essentially stuck with it as it goes very well with the computer desk I purchased, but it is not meant for long sitting, that is for sure. I use it to browse internet for under an hour a day, so it's OK
